QAPair.Question: What is (are) Make peak flow a habit! ?
QAPair.Answer: Checking your peak flow is one of the best ways to control your asthma and to keep it from getting worse. Asthma attacks do not usually come on without warning. Most times, they build slowly. Checking your peak flow can tell you if an attack is coming, sometimes before you have any symptoms.
